meanings.definition: (ポルトガル語) 義務を免れる、解放される、責任を逃れる
meanings.english_definition: (Portuguese) to be relieved of an obligation, to be freed from a duty, to evade responsibility.

examples.translation: He was released from his promise.
examples.english_translation: He was relieved of his promise.

examples.translation: She was freed from the task.
examples.english_translation: She was freed from the task.

examples.sentence: Não se pode desobrigar-se das suas responsabilidades.

collocations: desobrigar-se de uma promessa (約束から解放される)
desobrigar-se de uma tarefa (任務から解放される)
desobrigar-se de responsabilidades (責任を逃れる)

etymology.value: 「des-」(否定の接頭辞) + 「obrigar」(義務付ける) + 「-se」(再帰代名詞)

usage_notes.explanation: 「desobrigar-se」は再帰動詞であり、主語自身が義務や責任から解放されることを意味します。 他者を解放する場合は「desobrigar」を使用します。

examples.note: 再帰動詞なので、再帰代名詞が必要です。
「desobrigar」は他者を解放する意味で使用する場合は、直接目的語を取ります。

derivatives: desobrigação (名詞: 義務の免除、解放)

example_sentences.sentence: O juiz desobrigou-o do pagamento da multa.
example_sentences.translation: The judge relieved him of the payment of the fine.

example_sentences.sentence: Ela desobrigou-se da responsabilidade de organizar a festa.
example_sentences.translation: She relieved herself of the responsibility of organizing the party.

example_sentences.sentence: Quero desobrigar-me deste compromisso o mais rápido possível.
example_sentences.translation: I want to be relieved of this commitment as soon as possible.
